text: <@UTQQ4TXCH> Is it possible on page level to reference another theme module?
Could you give me an example? Just want to make sure I understand exactly what you are asking.
how do we break cache for theme module image/icons? I’m speaking of icons on the left “add” sidebar for the page editor
i had a huge issue with that, and it turned out in my case that there were duplicate files deep in the tree from when i was updating my webpack URLs and had a typo.

in fact, i had three sets of files and three icons, and it was making me irate until i figured out that i had two “hidden” copies in the DM because of a path spelling error. any chance there could be duplicate files floating around?
nah it’s set with a relative path and I checked the theme file in the DM and the svg shows correctly there. It is the page editor that’s screwing it up
